summary: Completed comprehensive backend and frontend testing for Fynny financial well-being app. All 24 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend integration verified - user progress, fynnies count, daily tasks, and week calendar all displaying correctly from MongoDB backend.
passed_tests: Backend: API health check - GET /api/ returns success
Backend: User creation - POST /api/users creates new user with ID
Backend: User retrieval - GET /api/users/{username} returns user
Backend: User progress - GET /api/progress/{user_id} returns complete progress data
Backend: New user starts with 0 fynnies
Backend: Mood check-in - POST /api/mood/{user_id} creates check-in
Backend: Mood check-in awards 1 fynny
Backend: Mood check-in updates daily task to completed
Backend: Mood history - GET /api/mood/{user_id} returns history
Backend: Spending entry - POST /api/spending/{user_id} creates entry
Backend: Spending updates daily task progress (X/3)
Backend: Spending task completes after 3 entries
Backend: Spending history - GET /api/spending/{user_id} returns entries
Backend: Lesson progress update - POST /api/progress/{user_id}/lessons
Backend: Completing lesson awards 1 fynny
Backend: Course lessons - GET /api/progress/{user_id}/lessons/{course_id}
Backend: Daily task update - POST /api/progress/{user_id}/tasks
Backend: Daily tasks retrieval - GET /api/progress/{user_id}/tasks
Backend: Streak update - POST /api/progress/{user_id}/streak
Backend: Course completion awards 5 bonus fynnies
Backend: Demo user creation/retrieval works
Backend: Demo user progress accessible
Frontend: Home screen loads with all components
Frontend: Week tracker displays with current day (W) highlighted
Frontend: Fynnies count displays correctly (2 earned)
Frontend: Course card shows 'How Money Feels' with lesson progress
Frontend: Check-in card shows completed state with mood 'happy'
Frontend: Track spending shows 1/3 progress
Frontend: Set commitment button displayed
Frontend: Desktop microlearning section displayed
Frontend: Course modal opens with lesson list
Frontend: Lesson titles displayed in modal (Prepare finances, Discover money style, Start tracking)
Frontend: Financial Health page loads with Trends tab
Frontend: Fynnies Earned card shows 12 with +3 from last week
seed_data_creation: Test users created with TEST_ prefix for backend tests. Demo user 'demo_user' used by frontend.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All backend APIs working correctly with MongoDB. Frontend successfully fetches and displays user progress, fynnies, daily tasks, and week calendar from backend. Demo user auto-created on frontend load. Test file at /app/backend/tests/test_fynny_api.py covers all CRUD operations for users, progress, mood, spending, lessons, and tasks.

observations.fynnies_display: Home screen shows 2 fynnies earned (from backend), Financial Health shows 12 (may be different user or cached data)
observations.week_calendar: Wednesday (W) correctly highlighted as current day
observations.course_progress: 2 lessons completed, 1 lesson left (Start tracking calmly)
